org.activebpel.rt.bpel
Interface IAeEndpointReference

All Superinterfaces:
IAeWebServiceEndpointReference, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeEndpointReference
public interface IAeEndpointReference
extends IAeWebServiceEndpointReference, java.io.Serializable

Describes the interface used for interacting with business processes. This extends IAeWebServiceEndpointReference to add convenience methods but should not add additional data.

setSourceNamespace

public void setSourceNamespace(java.lang.String aNamespace)
